Comments :
Five college friends choose to spend their vacation debauching at 
the riverside. They find the perfect place to camp out, but end 
up crossing paths with twin brothers, Simon and Stanley. The twins 
then begins to knock off the campers in some extremely creative 
(and extremely gruesome) ways. Enjoy the splatter.
